ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:1}); // …My hometown, Corel's always
been a coal mining town.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:2}); // It may be dusty and poor,
but it's calm…
It's a real small town.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:3}); // That's the first time I ever heard
"Mako Reactor" mentioned since then…

dialogStrings:
…My hometown, Corel's always
been a coal mining town.

It may be dusty and poor,
but it's calm…
It's a real small town.

That's the first time I ever heard
"Mako Reactor" mentioned since then…

We all dreamt of the good life.
Then, all of a sudden, Shinra troops came…
